rows.label: qev031207_MSG0001
rows.name: Are you the one, then? Come to split us apart?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031207_MSG0002
rows.name:
And just because we're a Prone and a human?
Unbelievable...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031207_MSG0003
rows.name:
Until recently, a show like that might have had me
shaking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031207_MSG0004
rows.name: Unfortunately for you, I'm not the same weakling I was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031207_MSG0005
rows.name:
There are no words you or anyone else could say
to change my mind. No actions you could take.
No pain you could inflict.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031207_MSG0006
rows.name:
From here on out, I will be stronger than anyone,
no matter what world they're from![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031207_MSG0007
rows.name: Leroy, we must run. That [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]seems very strong![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031207_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm enough of a BLADE to see that, Lavina.
But I'm done running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031207_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm going to protect you from everything this world
throws at us. Prone... Humans... BLADEs...
Whatever it is, I refuse to back down any more![ST:wait ]
